show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 79 Wood Turner and Atish Babu, how to build the ideal regenerative fund structure
subtitle: 79 Wood Turner and Atish Babu, how to build the ideal regenerative fund structure
summary:
In this interview, we take on this challenge with regenerative agriculture fund managers Wood Turner and Atish Babu of Agriculture Capital. Together they have raised 800 million across two funds for permanent crops in the last six years. 

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food.
Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag. 
Other ways to support our work:
- Share the podcast
- Give a 5-star rating
- Or buy us a coffee… or a meal!
www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture. 
-----------------------------------------------------------

With Wood Turner and Atish Babu we talk about key points, how did they start their mission in regenerative agriculture, how do they think about the future, how would they structure the ideal regenerative fund, and many more!

More about this episode on: www.investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/2020/05/20/wood-turner-atish-babu/. 

-----------------------------------------------------------
